posts.post_content:
Looking for a good condition copy of a1909 Pittsburgh Pirates Extension Postcard. Folding style card, Huggins and Scott had one for sale back in 2007.
Here are some examples;
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=220182&d=1454617037[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=220183&d=1454617054[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=220184&d=1454617068[/IMG]

Being a Gibson fan, i'd take a hand cut Gibson portion of this folding post card.
PM if you can help.
Thanks, Marty
